text: Gabo: The Creation of Gabriel Garcia Marquez (also known as Gabo, The Magic of Reality) is a 2015 Colombian documentary directed by Justin Webster about the life story of award-winning writer Gabriel García Márquez. == Awards == {| class="wikitable" ! title: Gabo, la creación de Gabriel García Márquez
